BasicInfo.short: Kaboodle is a shopping site that lets users list their preferred products on the web while automatically downloading the details of them.

Products.name: Kaboodle
Products.description: Kaboodle is a free service that lets users collect information from the web and store it on a Kaboodle list that can be shared with others.
